games.name: The Rise of Darius the Great
games.description: The Rise of Darius the Great - 522 BC. You are Oebares, servant to Darius. After a rebellion against the mad ruler Cambyses II, seven candidates, including Darius, meet in a council to decide who will be the next king. Can you help Darius win the thrown?

games.name: Amasis in a bind
games.description: The year is 525 BC and Cambyses II--son of Cyrus the Great--is now the Second King of the Persian Achaemenid Empire. Cambyses has just dispatched a herald to Egypt with a peculiar message for Amasis, King of the Egyptians. Cambyses has requested the hand of Amasis' daughter in marriage. Amasis finds himself in quite a bind.  Amasis is sorely afraid of the power of Persia. At the same time, he knows full well that Cambyses would make her not his queen but his mistress. As such he finds he can neither give his daughter nor deny her.
